CrushOnAI is for people on a budget and SoulFun is for those who want detailed pre-set characters to talk to. KupidAI is a straightforward AI date and DreamGF is a playmate to your specifications. IntimateAI is into super sexy voice chat and Candy AI is into deep AI immersion.

articles.summary: Google is bringing back widgets on the lock screen to Android. The feature was removed from Android 5.0 Lollipop. It is expected to be officially launched in June. Apple introduced widgets to the iPhone lock screen in iOS 16, followed by Samsung with One UI 6 and several Chinese companies joining in.

articles.title: People are only just realising how Babybel cheese got its name
articles.author: Sophie Roberts
articles.summary: The original Babybel cheese dates back to 1952, but the Mini Babybel came into being 25 years later. The company introduced the signature red wax coating and cellophane wrap in the 1970s. The original is a mild, creamy Edam cheese, but there's also light versions and variants such as gouda, cheddar and mozzarella. The plant-based Babybel is made with coconut oil and starch.

articles.title: HSBC Bank promotes Dave Sabow to global role
articles.author: Business Journal
articles.summary: He will tackle his new global responsibilities from the birthplace of the innovation economy in San Francisco, California. He will start a new job there.   He will be responsible for global development of the San Francisco economy. He is also responsible for international development of technology.

articles.title: This Viral Detergent Hack Has People Questioning If They're Doing Laundry Wrong
articles.author: Caroline Bologna
articles.summary: TikTok user Iluka shared a video of her boyfriend doing laundry. In the video, he is seen tossing the detergent cap into the drum with the load of clothes. Many people defend the method, saying it prevents the cap from getting gross and sticky from detergent residue. Laundry experts are not opposed to the method and say it's common.

articles.summary: Galaxy S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra are Samsung's latest Galaxy S smartphones. The Galaxy S25 starts at $800, the S25+ is $200 more, and the S 25 Ultra is $1,300 more. Qualcomm's Snapdragon Elite chip is the main reason to consider upgrading.

The platform is designed to meet the growing demands of modern enterprises by providing real-time access to advanced computational power.

articles.summary: Action has announced the opening of two new stores in Portugal, one in Vila Nova de Gaia and the other in Viana do Castelo. The average price of all products is less than two euros. Action offers a selection of 150 new products every week to meet the diverse needs and preferences of customers.

articles.title: Which ute should you buy in 2025?
articles.author: Josh Nevett
articles.summary: If they can make a variant that has the practicality of the XLT but with cooled seats I'd buy it tomorrow. I'm tempted to order a Super Duty just because it is exactly what I want in a truck if I can't have one of the big Americans.

articles.author: Jessica Fritsch
articles.summary: LG Electronics presented new accessibility technology for the U.S. market at the CSUN Assistive Technology Conference. LG was the first global home appliance company to exhibit at the conference. The conference is held by California State University, Northridge and is the largest of its kind.

articles.title: The best steam cleaners and mops for a sparkling home, tested
articles.author: Stuart Andrews
articles.summary: Steam mops and steam cleaners make cleaning faster and easier. The best steam mops start from less than £50 and the best full-size steam cleaners from £150 to £180. The Guardian's journalism is independent. We earn a commission if you buy something through an affiliate link.

articles.title: Next's 'soft' and 'lightweight' £29 shacket shoppers are 'buying in multiple colours'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Next is selling a lightweight jacket that's perfect for chilly spring weather. Next shoppers have rated the layer a 4.5 out of 5 on the website, praising it for its versatility. The shacket is available in pink, black, charcoal grey and neutral colours and costs £29.

articles.title: Outdated Systems Are Harming Your Business More Than You Realize. Here's How to Modernize Before Disaster Strikes.

articles.summary: It's time to break free from legacy systems and future-proof your business. Here are some tips on how to do it successfully and why it's a good idea to do so.   .   i   in this article:

articles.title: Hot out of the oven: The ‘live bakery' boom in Dhaka
articles.author: Mahmudul Hasan
articles.summary: At least five live bakeries have opened in Dhaka in the past year. Live bakeries offer a transparent and interactive experience where customers can watch the baking process in real time. They are popular with students, office workers, and families. They offer a variety of baked goods and prices start from Tk 20 for a loaf of bread.

articles.title: 'Great bang for the buck': This waterproof speaker is down to $20, but not for long
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: The BolaButty Bluetooth Speaker is on sale for $20 on Amazon. It's compact, portable and has a long battery life. The speaker has nearly 16,000 five-star reviews. Amazon Prime members get free shipping on orders of $35 or more.

articles.title: The most useful and clever products we tried in March
articles.summary: The Daily Hive recommends some of the best inventions they've tried recently. Scrub Daddy Sponge Set is a great scrubber. Hot Poc Reusable Hand Warmer is a useful tool for people with sensitive gums. Coway uses an air purifier to help reduce pollution.

articles.title: ANZZI Redefines Style with Luxury Shower Doors
articles.summary: ANZZI launched a customizable luxury shower door line, offering homeowners unique finishes and glass options to enhance their bathrooms. The U.S. shower door market is projected to reach $4.51 billion by 2026 with a CAGR of 6.47%.

articles.title: Reddit will let you hide ads
articles.author: Jay Peters
articles.summary: Reddit is rolling out a feature that lets you hide an ad from your feed for at least a year. The update will be available on iOS, Android and Reddit.com in the next several weeks. When an ad becomes visible again after you hide it, you can re-hide it if you want.

articles.title: Kioxia Unveils 122.88TB High-capacity SSD For AI Applications
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation has announced the development of its new KIOXIA LC9 Series 122.88 terabytes (TB) NVMe solid-state drive (SSD) for artificial intelligence (AI) applications. It is the first SSD built with the company's BiCS FLASH generation 8 3D flash memory technology. It will be showcased at upcoming conferences starting this month.

articles.title: iRobot's understated new fleet of Roombas nails what I actually want from a robot vacuum
articles.author: Ruth Hamilton
articles.summary: iRobot is replacing its entire robot vacuum range with four new models. The 205 DustCompactor is the most innovative model in the new Roomba lineup. iRobot's GRID system mixes in matte and textured areas to give the robots a friendlier appearance. LiDAR is the big addition to the new robots.

articles.title: Is Nutella Grilled Cheese Worth The Try?
articles.author: Mariana Zapata
articles.summary: Nutella is one of the best culinary inventions of the 20th century, made with hazelnuts and cocoa cream. The spread is soft, creamy, and sweet, leaving behind a lingering taste of happiness and sunshine. The grilled cheese sandwich is the result of the combination of Nutella and cheese.

articles.title: Shoppers ditch Henry vacuum for 'fantastic' Amazon alternative
articles.author: Shania King-Soyza
articles.summary: The Ultenic U12 Vesla vacuum cleaner is available on Amazon for £140. With a new voucher, you can get a £15 discount. The U12 has a powerful 45000Pa suction power, four suction modes and a healthy battery life of 50 minutes. Argos is offering a £40 discount on its Henry XL Plus Corded Bagged Cylinder Vacuum Cleaner.

articles.title: What's Next in the Evolution of Generative AI-Powered Marketing
articles.author: Ashley R. Cummings
articles.summary: Industry leaders discuss the opportunities and challenges of using AI in modern marketing. They discuss how to navigate the challenges of deploying AI at scale, from managing brand safety to enhancing creativity. They also discuss the future of AI-powered marketing and how to balance it with human creativity.

articles.title: Apple's new MacBook Air, iPad and desktop computer are here — but should you upgrade?
articles.author: Zoe Malin
articles.summary: Brooks has released a special edition of its Glycerin 22 sneakers. Saucony is re-launching its Matrix sneaker 25 years after it was first launched. Staple x Brooks has re-released one of its oldest sneakers, the Adrenaline GTS 4, in collaboration with Jeff Staple, a New York-based streetwear designer. Theragun Mini (3rd Generation) is smaller and more portable than most portable devices on the market. Mac Studio (M4 Max) and Mac Studio Ultra (M3 Ultra) are powerful computers best suited for creative professionals with technically demanding workflows. Apple's new MacBook Air starts at $999.

articles.title: The best new products from March (so far): Shop Apple, Dyson, Therabody and more
articles.author: Zoe Malin
articles.summary: Brooks released a special-edition pair of its Glycerin 22 sneakers. Saucony re-launched its Matrix sneaker 25 years after it was first launched. Staple x Brooks re-released one of its oldest sneakers, the Adrenaline GTS 4, in collaboration with Jeff Staple, a New York-based streetwear designer. Therabody Theragun Mini is an NBC Select Wellness Award winner and their favorite massage gun for travel.

articles.title: CrushOn.AI Unveils NSFW AI Girlfriend Chat in 2025
articles.summary: CrushOn's AI chat platform, NSFW AI Girlfriend Chat, is all about user privacy, ease of use and cutting-edge tech. CrushOn plans to roll out voice interaction features and collaborative chat scenarios involving multiple users in the future to make the platform even more realistic.

articles.title: CrushOn.AI Unveils NSFW AI Girlfriend Chat in 2025
articles.author: CRUSHON AI CORP
articles.summary: CrushOn.AI's NSFW AI Girlfriend chat is all about user privacy, ease of use, and cutting-edge tech. CrushOn is dedicated to developing advanced AI technologies with a special focus on personalization, accessibility, and user privacy. The company plans to roll out voice interaction features and collaborative chat scenarios involving multiple users.

articles.title: PoolLeads.AI Revolutionizes Lead Generation for Pool Companies with Cutting-Edge AI Technology
articles.author: Jim Lisi
articles.summary: PoolLeads.AI is a new AI-powered lead generation platform designed for high-end pool builders, installers, audio companies, pool resurfacing companies, landscapers, pool equipment companies, maintenance companies and pool service companies. The platform uses advanced AI algorithms to identify, engage, and convert potential customers through highly targeted digital marketing strategies. Early adopters will get priority access to high-quality leads.

articles.title: Astro Bot PS5 bundle is an absolute steal right now on PlayStation Direct
articles.author: Christopher Harper
articles.summary: Astro Bot, one of the most acclaimed PS5 games of 2024, is now available in a bundle with a digital PS5 for £339.99. The package includes a slim PS5 with a 1TB SSD and free express delivery. The PS5 Slim isn't the latest or most advanced console, so if you're a dedicated gamer, you should choose the PS5 Pro.

articles.title: Boden's 'figure-flattering' and 'fun' spring dress is perfect for weddings
articles.author: Eve Rowlands
articles.summary: The Lily Jersey Midi Tea Dress from Boden is a versatile wardrobe staple suitable for formal and casual events. It is available in petite and regular lengths in sizes 4 to 22. Shoppers who use a discount code can get an additional 15% off. The tea dress usually sells for £98 but can be bought for £83.30 with the code 6RZQ.

articles.title: Not all bubble baths are safe — these are the ones you can actually trust
articles.author: Bianca Alvarez
articles.summary: The best bubble bath soaps for kids are tear-free, hypoallergenic and made with gentle ingredients. Dermatologists and pediatricians recommend CeraVe Baby Wash and Shampoo for children with sensitive skin. Editor's sister and cousin use Tubby Toad Bubble Bath aunts and Sweet Quince + Huckleberry for their sensitive children.

articles.title: Kioxia Announces High-Capacity KIOXIA LC9 Series 122.88 TB NVMe SSD for AI Applications
articles.author: BERNAMA
articles.summary: Kioxia Corporation announced the development of its new KIOXIA LC9 Series 122.88 terabyte (TB) NVMe™ SSD in a 2.5-inch form factor. It is the first SSD built with the company's BiCS FLASH™ generation 8 3D flash memory technology 2 terabit (Tb) QLC die. It's designed for high capacity and provides a PCIe 5.0 interface with dual-port capability for fault tolerance or connectivity to multiple compute systems.

articles.title: Swiss payment app Twint announces new features
articles.author: Ben McPartland
articles.summary: The Twint app was introduced in Switzerland in 2014. It is now accepted by 80 percent of retailers and supermarkets in Switzerland. New features will allow businesses to offer customers an 'Express checkout' to customers when they shop online and create a special Twint ID. The company also launched a new Twint Business Portal which will allow sellers to better monitor transactions and send notifications.

articles.title: Microsoft Edge on Android Has Extensions Now (Before Chrome)
articles.author: Joe Fedewa
articles.summary: Edge for Android now supports extensions, with an Extension Store offering 22 tools. Microsoft started testing extensions in Edge for Android over a year ago, in January 2024. The Extension Store is still in beta. There are some popular extensions from the desktop version of Microsoft Edge.

articles.title: Wally Kennedy: Casey's opening on South Main a step in tornado recovery
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Shoppers at the new Casey's General Store, 2501 S. Main St., experienced a new store smell on Thursday. Friends have encouraged him to try the breakfast pizza served at Casey's. He has never had breakfast pizza from Casey's, so this was all new territory for him.

articles.title: Nova Scotia Loyal program sows seeds of dissatisfaction
articles.author: Francis Campbell
articles.summary: The number of businesses in the Nova Scotia Loyal producer labelling pilot program doubled in one week to about 540. Chris Sanford, co-owner of Yonder Hill Farm in Lunenburg County, Nova Scotia, registered for the program last week. She is frustrated with a recent social media post from a program staffer.

articles.title: Three Bath & Body Works store changes coming as exec promises shoppers should ‘try products first'
articles.author: James Evenden
articles.summary: There are three changes coming to Bath & Body Works stores. The Gingham+ layout design is being expanded in the majority of new openings in the US this year. The new layout promises "a seamless in-store customer shopping experience". The beauty retailer is introducing new scent bars in select stores and videos to help customers discover new fragrances.

articles.title: Walmart's best selling $700 robot pool cleaner is now $379 ahead of spring
articles.author: Yzzy Liwanag
articles.summary: Walmart is having a sale on its best selling WYBOT robotic pool cleaner. It costs $379 (was $700). It's built for deep and efficient cleaning of inground pools. It has a powerful filtration rate of up to 2642 GPH and dual PVC brushes. It can climb walls and clean the waterline. The cordless design offers convenience and ease of use.

articles.title: Hyderabad: Syneriq Global opens GCC for AI products, solutions and consulting services
articles.author: Telangana Today
articles.summary: Syneriq Global opened its new AI products, solutions and consulting services GCC in Hyderabad, enabled by Mergen Global. The new state-of-the-art 40,000 sft facility was established with an investment of Rs 50 crore. The company also demonstrated its latest AI-powered digital platform and solutions (Zyrix, KiTAP and DQ Gateway)

articles.title: 1,000 kW fast charging?!? BYD teases tech twice as fast as Tesla, debuting March 17
articles.author: Scooter Doll
articles.summary: Build Your Dreams (BYD) is preparing a launch event on Monday, March 17th at 7 PM Beijing time (7 AM EDT). It promises the debut of a new 'BYD Super e-Platform' and a new ultra-fast EV charger with up to 1,000 kW of power. It is twice as powerful as the current best on the market.

articles.title: Revamped Desktop Mode in Android 16 Beta 3: What You Need to Know
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Android 16 is a step closer to a desktop-like experience. Android 16 Beta 3 hints at a potential transformation in how users interact with external displays. Samsung DeX mode has paved the way for Android 16. Anya Sharma is a tech analyst at FutureForward Insights.

articles.title: Tenant Bought Himself A Washer And Dryer For His Apartment, But When He Moved Out The Entitled Landlord Attempted To Make Him Leave The Appliances Behind
articles.author: Michael Levanduski
articles.summary: A young man moved out of his previous apartment and took his washer and dryer with him. The landlord tried to make him leave them behind, so he called the police. His lawyer advised him not to respond to the landlord anymore for the time being. His co-worker thinks he should have told the landlord he took the appliances.

articles.title: I stopped using Alexa long ago. Here are 6 ways Alexa+ could lure me back
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Alexa will be rebranded as Alexa+. It will be free for Amazon Prime members and $19.99 a month for non-Prime members. Alexa+ will harness the power of generative AI to hold flowing conversations, understand intentions and take actions on people's behalf.

articles.title: Find your ideal Dyson vacuum cleaner for a deeper clean
articles.author: Liam McCann
articles.summary: Dyson's range of vacuums makes cleaning your home and car a breeze. They have models to tackle pet hair, wash wooden floors, and remove dust and other allergens. Dyson's most powerful HEPA cordless vacuum has 70-minute run time and delivers deeper whole-home cleaning with advanced HEPA filtration.

articles.title: ‘Are they gonna pay rent?!': Woman orders Scrub Daddy from Costco. Then she sees what she received
articles.author: Brooke Sjoberg
articles.summary: Keyosha333 bought Scrub Daddy sponges and scrubbers from Costco Canada. The variety pack comes with a grandfather, father, son, dog, grandmother, mom, daughter, and cat. The video with the video has over 582,000 views on TikTok. The Daily Dot reached out to Keyosha via direct message.

articles.title: Ditch your TV with this portable, Netflix-certified projector
articles.author: Stack Commerce
articles.summary: An XGODY Full HD 1080P projector is on sale for $109.99 (reg. $399). Netflix-certified projector offers stunning 1080P full HD resolution no matter what you watch. It has a built-in 5W speaker and Google Assistant voice control.

articles.title: Narwal Launches the Freo Pro, the Best Zero-Tangle Robot Vacuum Designed for Hair and Fur Mess
articles.author: Pr Newswire
articles.summary: Narwal launched the new Freo Pro today. It's a mid-range robot vacuum and mop with an all-in-one station designed for effortless maintenance and powerful cleaning. The product will be available at a special launch price of 599.99(U.S.)/849.99 (Canada).

articles.title: Air Wick diffusers have been slashed to 2p at major supermarket – and they even come with TWO refills
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: The Air Wick Essential Mist Diffuser is currently scanning for just 2p at a major UK retailer. The starter kit features a cherry blossom and raspberry scent and comes with two refills. It is listed on the Asda website for £7.98. Eilish Stout-Cairns recommends buying items from Asda's budget range and signing up to Asda Rewards.

articles.title: Azerion Launches Hawk DSP in US, Hawk Announced as Partner for Scope3 Agentic Media Platform
articles.summary: Azerion's cost-effective DSP comes to the US, makes curated audiences available to Scope3's customers. Scope3 launched its Agentic Media Platform on March 13. It allows publishers, ad tech platforms, curators and agencies to create agentic media products that leverage AI agents and custom algorithms.

articles.title: What Car Is Even Uglier Than A New Tesla Model Y?
articles.summary: The new Tesla Model Y is ugly. The Fiat Multipla is even uglier than the Model Y. Next week, Jalopnik will round up some of the worst cars and let you know which one is worse in the comments section below.

articles.title: Dutch startup Skylark takes off to give non-technical founders wings
articles.author: Thomas Macaulay
articles.summary: Skylark helps non-technical founders create Minimum Viable Products (MVPs) using an AI-enhanced framework. Freelance developers apply the framework to build the MVPs, while an internal team handles the client acquisition. Skylark draws from a pool of freelancers to find developers that fit each project's specific needs.

articles.title: Google's AI virtual try-on tool lets you shop from home with ease
articles.author: Elizabeth Prann
articles.summary: Google has rolled out an artificial intelligence-powered tool that allows clothing shoppers to find the perfect fit without ever stepping into a dressing room. The initial launch only includes women's clothing, but a version for men is expected by the end of the year. Google's beauty try-on tool launched in 2020 allows customers to try on cosmetics.

articles.title: Edge Marketing Launches "Edge Unscripted' Podcast to Lead Conversations on Marketing Innovation and Industry Evolution
articles.summary: Edge Marketing, Inc. has launched a new podcast, "Edge Unscripted". It's a behind-the-scenes look at the big ideas driving today's marketing and PR landscape. The podcast is aimed at promoting the agency's brand refresh and adoption of AI-empowered strategies.

articles.title: Dyson released stunning new ‘Jasper Plum' Airwrap i.d. multi-styler
articles.author: Josie Howell
articles.summary: Dyson has released a new version of its Airwrap multi-styler. The new purple Dyson Airwrap i.d. retails for $599.99. It comes with a 30-day return period, a two-year warranty and free shipping.

articles.title: Kioxia Unveils 122.88TB High-capacity SSD For AI Applications
articles.author: Malaysian National News Agency
articles.summary: Kioxia unveils 122.88TB High-Capacity NVMe SSD for AI Applications for its LC9 Series for new business in Kuala Lumpur. Business Wire reports that Kioxia's new product is a high-capacity NVMe drive for AI applications.

articles.title: Six AI hacks transforming how Nigerian Gen Zs hustle smarter, live better
articles.author: The Nation
articles.summary: Nigerian Gen Zs are finding new ways to winturn their creativity, hustle and lifestyle into opportunities to stand out and stay ahead. Whether they're building their social media, they're using AI to help them do it better.

articles.title: Humanoids, nurse bots, remote forklifts showcased at robot expo in Punggol Digital District
articles.author: Osmond Chia
articles.summary: Androids are increasingly being tested in heavy industries and manufacturing plants in Singapore. Local robotics company dConstruct Robotics is planning to deploy humanoids as an assistant for concierge services and chores in the office through a tie-up with US robotics firm Persona AI. The number of exhibitors at RoboSG! held every two years has more than doubled since the last edition in 2023.

articles.title: Humanoids, nurse bots, remote forklifts showcased at Punggol Digital District
articles.author: Osmond Chia
articles.summary: Androids are increasingly being tested in heavy industries and manufacturing plants in Singapore. The number of exhibitors at RoboSG! has more than doubled since the last edition in 2023. Manpower Minister and Second Minister for Trade and Industry announced an accelerator initiative to support local robotics firms with business consultancy and client connections.

articles.title: Why choose the best wet dry vacuum for your home
articles.author: Montreal Times
articles.summary: Wet dry vacuums are versatile vacuum cleaners that work on both wet and dry dirt. They can be of different sizes and with different motor powers. For heavy-duty cleaning, consider a larger model with 12-16 gallons. For allergy sufferers, a wet dry vacuum with a HEPA filter is a must.

articles.title: Primech AI to Showcase HYTRON AI-Powered Autonomous Bathroom Cleaning Robot at RoboSG 2025
articles.author: Primech Holdings Ltd.
articles.summary: Primech AI Pte. Ltd. is a subsidiary of Primech Holdings Limited (Nasdaq: PMEC). Primech AI will showcase its groundbreaking AI-powered autonomous bathroom cleaning robot, HYTRON, at RoboSG 2025. This page requires Javascript.

articles.title: National CineMedia Announces Bullseye to Further Enhance its Data-Driven Solutions with AI-Powered Hyper-Local Targeting Capabilities
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Bullseye is the latest addition to National Cine Media's NCMx suite. Bullseye uses AI-generated creative to deliver dynamic, hyper-localized messaging at scale. It works by integrating key signals such as designated market area, geo-targeting, local offers, and audience insights.

articles.title: Aldi Finds just brought back a kitchen essential for $3.99 that you ‘don't want to pass' on
articles.author: James Evenden
articles.summary: ALDI has brought back a kitchen essential for just $3.99. A YouTube sleuth, called Jackie, went to her local store and found the product. The drying mat measures 18 inches by 24 inches in size and is reversible and absorbent. The Stanley Cup dupe has been back on shelves since March 12.

articles.title: Fluffy Fluffy's souffle pancakes coming to NJ
articles.author: Kimberly Redmond
articles.summary: Fluffy Fluffy GO! is bringing its Japanese-style soufflé pancakes and other savory delights to New Jersey. The new location is scheduled to open March 15 at Newport Centre in Jersey City. The brand was founded seven years ago in Toronto and has over 40 locations across the U.S., U.K., Canada, China, France and Morocco. Next month, the brand expects to launch a global flagship at 153 1st Ave. in New York City.

articles.title: Former Himachal Congress MLA shot at, hospitalised
articles.author: Hamirpur/Bilaspur
articles.summary: According to CNN.com, the number of women in the U.S. is at an all-time high. It is estimated at more than half a billion people. The number is estimated to be approaching 60 million people. It's estimated to reach 70 million by the year's end.

articles.title: McDonald's Is Making a Big Change to Its Ordering System—And You're Going to Love It
articles.author: Nina Derwin
articles.summary: McDonald's is introducing a new AI-based technology system to its 43,000 locations around the world. The new technology system will be able to predict when kitchen equipment might break down. There will also be AI-powered drive-thru changes. The technology is in place in a number of locations and is in the exploration stage.

articles.title: Beyond The Brand: The Rise Of Product Marketing In The Modern Age
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Product marketers craft narratives that position the product effectively and address customer challenges. They also guide successful go-to-market strategies for their products. articles.title: U of G students competing to find solutions for world hunger
articles.author: Guelphtoday Staff
articles.summary: This year's Project SOY Plus competition at the University of Guelph's student competition takes place on March 20th. The theme supports the sustainable development goals from the United Nations: Zero Hunger and Life on Land. More than 60 students have developed projects, services and prototypes to promote global food security, improve nutrition and support the sustainable management of ecosystems.

articles.title: Korean AI firm launches trend analysis service for social media data
articles.author: 언더스탠딩 텍스트
articles.summary: South Korean AI firm Newen AI has introduced a new trend analysis service Quetta AI. It analyzes unstructured social media data to help businesses identify market trends and optimize decision-making. The service can recognize variations in spelling and slang to ensure comprehensive trend tracking.

articles.title: Edinburgh students queue overnight for 12 hours to get free chicken from Popeyes
articles.author: Digital Reporter
articles.summary: Edinburgh students camped outside Popeyes on Prince Street from 10pm on Thursday night in the hope of getting free food for a year. The first three customers who walk through the doors when the shop opens at 11am will be entitled to free chicken sandwiches. The restaurant will also give the first 100 people on Friday, March 14, a free chicken sandwich.

articles.title: Aldi's device is alternative to ironing but shoppers have to be quick
articles.author: Brian Dillon
articles.summary: Aldi's new steamer costs £16.99 and is available as part of its spring clean sale. It's a Specialbuys product and will only be available in Aldi stores while stocks last. Steamers are an easy alternative to ironing and save space.

articles.title: Huawei Nova Y72S Full Specs, Features, Price In Philippines
articles.author: Cris Sayson
articles.summary: The Huawei Nova Y72S was officially announced in the fourth quarter of 2024. It is fueled with a Li-Ion 6000 mAh battery + 22.5W wired charging. The phone is available in two colors: Blue and Black. The main camera is 50MP + 2MP, the front camera is 8MP with a Digital zoom. The device has Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-fi Direct, Bluetooth 5.0, GPS, GALILEO, GLONASS, Beidou, QZSS, NFC, USB Type-C 2.0 and OTG.

articles.title: China Consumption: Smart home technology takes off in China
articles.summary: China has rolled out over $40 billion in subsidies to boost consumption and encourage consumers to trade in old appliances for new ones. Gen-Z, millennials and the silver-haired are called 'Three Pivotal Generations' who are key to reshaping China retail momentum.

articles.title: Aldi Scotland launches exclusive summer beer range with leading Scottish breweries
articles.author: Katie Buchan
articles.summary: Shoppers in Scotland will get exclusive access to 13 beers starting from just £1.49. The collection has been created in partnership with some of Scotland's most respected breweries, including Williams Bros, Fierce Beer, and Loch Lomond Brewery. Aldi Scotland is also bringing back its own brand Anti Establishment Hazy Guava IPA.

articles.author: Mary Alavanza
articles.summary: BZU BZU has opened its first representative office and showroom in Vietnam as part of its global expansion strategy. It has already established itself in Singapore, Malaysia, Brunei, Thailand, China and the Middle East. Its products undergo rigorous testing and strict dosing control by SGS Switzerland to ensure they are safe and gentle for newborns and sensitive skin.

articles.author: http://tempo.com.ph
articles.summary: Chizmis is a digital platform with a Pinoy identity that promises to redefine how you connect online. It's a social media app where you can share, react, and engage with like-minded individuals. It also allows users to shop if they want to start a business. It offers revenue-sharing opportunities for both creators and users.

articles.title: Half Price Print Launches to Empower UAE Businesses with Affordable, Customizable Printing Solutions
articles.summary: Half Price Print, a division of Half Price Packaging, is now serving businesses in the UAE, offering high-quality, cost-effective printing solutions. Half Price Print offers low minimum order quantities (MOQs) and integrates eco-friendly materials and processes into its production.

articles.title: Aldi shoppers can get a £15 dupe of The White Company's £70 ceramic diffuser & it makes the perfect Mother's Day gift
articles.author: Engagement Editor
articles.summary: Aldi's latest Specialbuy is already creating a buzz, with shoppers praising its sleek design and long-lasting fragrance. The ceramic diffuser costs just £14.99, which is £55 cheaper than The White Company's version. Aldi is well-known for its affordable beauty dupes.

articles.title: Auckland AI Start-Up ListAssist Acquired by US Firm Inside Real Estate: A Major Leap in Real Estate Innovation
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: ListAssist is a New Zealand-based startup that uses artificial intelligence to transform how people search for homes. The company has signed a deal with Howard Hanna, the largest autonomous real estate broker in the U.S. with over 1 million listings across 13 states. ListAssist also provides tools for real estate agents to create search-engine-optimized ads and ensure compliance with regulations regarding property photos.

articles.title: Are Expensive Hair Dryers Really Worth It? Hair Stylists Have A Surprising Take.
articles.author: Julie Kendrick
articles.summary: Hair dryers have seen a surge in popularity in recent years, especially Dyson's Supersonic, which costs nearly $600. Stylists recommend using expensive dryers in their salons and recommending them to their clients. Stylish products and the quality of the dryer you choose will make a difference to your hair.

articles.title: Third-generation Mercedes CLA revealed with bold new look, futuristic cabin
articles.author: Jason Woosey
articles.summary: Mercedes-Benz has unveiled the third generation CLA sedan. It's the first member of its completely new compact car family. For the first time, it will not include any A-Class models. The new model is 35mm longer than its predecessor and 25mm wider and 29mm taller. It is just 28mm shorter than the latest C-Class sedan. The electric versions boast a 'frunk' under the bonnet.

articles.title: Takeaways: CES 2025
articles.author: Tina Nguyen
articles.summary: Alexis Walsko is the founder and CEO of Minneapolis-based Lola Red PR. She attended the Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas this year. CES draws nearly 140,000 people to see the latest innovations in technology. She recommends going big with interactive displays, temporary tattoo printers, and making it easy for attendees to connect digitally.

articles.summary: The Ninja Foodi toaster is on sale for £149.99. It comes with a crumb tray, bake tray, panini press and a recipe guide. It's easy to use and quick to heat up, but it's smaller than most toasters.

articles.author: Zika Bobby

articles.summary: US-headquartered Syneriq Global has inaugurated its new AI products, solutions, and consulting services Global Capability Centre (GCC) in Hyderabad. The state-of-the-art facility spans 40,000 square feet and was established with an investment of Rs 50 crore. Telangana government's goal is to transform Hyderabad into a thriving AI city.

articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Foldable phones offer a lot of flexibility over traditional candy bar-style handsets, but they're still expensive and they're not popular in the mass market yet. The Oppo Find N5 is a new book-style folding phone that is much thinner, lighter and more comfortable than the original Samsung Galaxy Z Fold.

articles.title: Mercedes-AMG CLA45 being reborn as a wild EV
articles.author: Jordan Mulach
articles.summary: AMG models often look sharper than their Benz counterparts. The CLA45 is expected to go one step further by being available with an active aerodynamics package. It will be available with or without the active aerodynamic package. The model will go on sale later this year.

articles.title: LG InstaView review: I tried the new oven that can replace every gadget in your kitchen. Here's why I will NEVER go back
articles.author: CINDY TRAN
articles.summary: LG's new Series 9 - 76L InstaView Full Steam Oven with Blue EasyClean costs $3,599. It's a six-in-one oven that makes daily cooking faster, easier and healthier. It can bake, roast, steam, air fry, grill, sous vide, dehydrate and deliver perfectly cooked pizzas.

articles.title: Google levels up Android graphics with Vulkan API in time for GDC 2025
articles.summary: Google has more than two billion monthly active players. Google is making the Vulkan technology into the official graphics API on Android, enabling developers to build immersive visuals, and enhancing the Android Dynamic Performance Framework to help them deliver longer, more stable gameplay. Google also launched a pilot program to simplify the process of bringing PC games to mobile.

articles.title: Transform your shower routine with Tree Hut's viral scrubs: Now available at Woolworths
articles.author: Olivia Scott
articles.summary: Tree Hut, the Korean skincare brand that has taken TikTok by storm, is launching its products in Woolworths starting today. Tree Hut's signature Shea Sugar Scrubs, available in indulgent scents like Moroccan Rose, Vanilla, and Tropic Glow, are the highlight of the brand's Aussie launch. The scrubs are formulated to exfoliate, renew, and hydrate the skin, leaving it feeling silky smooth and refreshed. The cult-favourite Whipped Body Butters and Foaming Gel Washes are also available.

articles.title: Dish Spray Is The Ultimate Kitchen Product You Never Knew You Needed
articles.author: Amanda Arnold
articles.summary: Dish spray makes dishwashing much less tedious. Professional housekeeper Sara San Angelo recommends it to her blog Confessions of a Cleaning Lady. She recommends Seventh Generation's honeycrisp apple-scented spray and 9 Elements' vinegar-based spray for stainless steel pans.

articles.summary: Discover AI-recommended Xizang travel essentials. DeepSeek's down jacket, Doubao's thermos, Kimi's rhodiola and iFlytek Spark's sunscreen are recommended for cold, high altitude and intense sun travel in China.

articles.title: Ring It Up: J.H. Patterson's Revolutionary Sales Techniques
articles.author: Jeff Minick
articles.summary: Patterson founded the National Cash Register Company in 1844 near Dayton, Ohio. He put cash registers into saloons, restaurants, and shops all around the country and revolutionized modern sales techniques. He was the first entrepreneur to put out a manual for his sales force and a book with a standard pitch to be used by every salesman. He also created quotas for salesmen and paid them a straight commission.

articles.summary: Fabian (Koonho) Lee, managing director of LG Electronics Singapore Limited, is in Nepal to explore business opportunities and understand the products that Nepali consumers are looking for to enhance their everyday lives. LG has established itself as a leading consumer electronic home appliance brand in Nepal. It has been 40 years since LG partnered with CG Group, Nepal to cater to the consumer electronics market in Nepal with its innovative technology. LG and CG Group work as one team, cooperating closely to build a strong brand.

articles.author: Slim Randles Columnist
articles.summary: Willoughby comes to the Soup 'R Market once a month. He has new things to sell each time. He sells simulated swordfish steaks, slightly sea bass, faux flounder, kinda crab, scarce scallops and his number one seller this week is Scarcely Scallops.
